creator: jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com
text:
It would be nice if Ant would not fail on these:

<fileset dir="someNonExistentDir"/>

The meaning really should be that there are no files in that fileset.

Any objections to this change being made in the 1.6 version?  Any issues that would be caused by this change?

creator: conor@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 11270 ***
